rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value:
You only need a few materials for these Early Family Math activities, and they are all very inexpensive and easy to get. 

Hereâ€™s a short list:
* Five dice
* A deck of playing cards
* String
* Sidewalk chalk
* Some stiff paper in various colors 

Many of our activities can be played using decks of playing cards. However, using a Number Card deck will help your child practice ideas that will not be emphasized with regular playing cards.

rows.name: text_bottom_1
rows.value: Make your own using card stock or any thick paper. You can either use the pdf supplied in Resources or draw your own.
